pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Relevance and Significance Measures // Calculates relevance and significance values for simple models and for many types of regression models. These are introduced in 'Stahel, Werner A.' (2021) "Measuring Significance and Relevance instead of p-values." https://stat.ethz.ch/~stahel/relevance/stahel- relevance2103.pdf. These notions are also applied to replication studies, as described in the manuscript 'Stahel, Werner A.' (2022) "'Replicability': Terminology, Measuring Success, and Strategy" available in the documentation.
